name: Grilled Lamb Chops with Pepper Jelly

ingredients.name: Rosemary Garlic Seasoning or Italian Seasoning

preparation: Brush lamb chops with oil. Sprinkle seasoning, Salt and Pepper on each side of chops and rub in.
Barbecue chops over medium heat, about 3-4 minutes per side for medium rare. Using Grip & Grab, remove chops to a warm platter and cover to keep warm.
Heat Red Pepper Jelly in a microwave-safe bowl for 1-2 minutes, stirring half-way through, until warm and melted. Spoon over grilled chops.

products.name: Rosemary Garlic Seasoning
summary: Enjoy hearty, robust flavors on chicken, pork, lamb & grilled or roasted vegetables.

products.name: Italian Seasoning
summary: A robust Italian blend perfect for pizza, bread dough, pasta or flatbreads.

products.name: Red Pepper Jelly (new)
summary: A sweet red pepper flavor with a mild heat from cayenne.
